title: Nexira Testnet Alert
message:
⏳ Only 1 DAY LEFT! Nexira Airdrop Season 2 closes on Feb 11 at 23:59 EST.
If you haven’t joined or completed your tasks yet, this is your LAST chance to claim rewards. Don’t miss out — join and earn before it’s gone!
